Module: camera

Camera API. All functions require a valid camera object ID. Constraints and standard translation/rotation functions also supported.
Source:
  • ext/camera.js, line 3

Members

(static, constant) MS_ANIMATION

Camera movement style - animated.

        (static) rotate(camobj, angle_h_delta, angle_v_delta)

        Rotate the camera. Around a target for TARGET movement style, around the eye for EYE movement style.
        Parameters:
        Name Type Description
        camobj Object Camera Object ID
        angle_h_delta Number Horizontal angle in radians
        angle_v_delta Number Vertical angle in radians

        • ext/camera.js, line 375

        (static) rotate_pivot(camobj, angle_h_delta, angle_v_delta)

        Rotate TARGET camera around the pivot point. +h from left to right (CCW around Y) +v down (CCW around DIR x Y)
        Parameters:
        Name Type Description
        camobj Object Camera Object ID
        angle_h_delta Number Horizontal angle in radians
        angle_v_delta Number Vertical angle in radians
